/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with bare trees, their branches reaching out into the clear blue sky. The buildings on either side of the street are made of red brick, adding a touch of color to the otherwise monochrome landscape. The sun casts long shadows on the ground, creating a play of light and dark that adds depth to the image. The overall scene is a blend of urban architecture and natural elements, presenting a typical day in this part of Beijing.
